content: Engin DemirSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationEngin DemirDepartment of Computer Engineering, Hacettepe UniversityE-mail: engindemir [at] hacettepe.edu.trAddress: Bilgisayar Mühendisliği Bölümü, Hacettepe Üniversitesi, Beytepe 06800 Çankaya/ ANKARAOffice:  203                    Phone: +90 (312) 297 7500 /129Looking for curious graduate students!We're excited about building algorithms and systems for next-generation intelligent data-intensive applications, and we're looking for graduate students who are interested in complex networks, artificial intelligence, data management, distributed systems, and data-intensive computing to join our research group."Çalışmadan, yorulmadan, öğrenmeden rahat yaşama yollarını aramayı itiyat haline getirmiş milletler, evvela haysiyetlerini, sonra hürriyetlerini ve daha sonra istiklallerini kaybetmeye mahkumdurlar."
